column4: Hey guys! This is actually a pretty old problem, but I fixed it and forgot about it.
The latest 2 nvidia drivers listed in EnvyNG don't work for me.
But the 3rd one (72.something) works.
the 173.x didn't work for me when i tried them. I'ld recommand to stay with the official repository ones (169.x, working good here with 8800 GTS 320mb)
how do I get the latest official repo one?

i think it is
if your GPU is recent, it should be nvidia-glx-new. You can check on Ubuntu docs what driver fits most with your GPU, and then remove --purge yours and install those from repo.
